name: NETXP LINUX Discretionary Access Control (DAC) Modifications
description: Monitors changes to file permissions and ownership for specific directories such as /etc, /bin, /sbin, /usr/bin, /usr/sbin, /var, /home, and /srv. Useful for detecting changes in access control that might impact system security.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "perm_mod" and 
any where event.module: "auditd"
